_comment: Enables the use of the mod. [true/false]
Make extracts available no matter what side of the map you spawned. [true/false]
Updates the percentage that random extracts are available. [number:0-100]
For example: Smuggler's Boat or Pier Boat. The Default is typically 50.
Updates CO-OP extracts to be useable via payment (like cars). [true/false]
By default, the payment is 5000 rubles.
Updates no-backpack extracts to be useable with backpacks. (Labs:Vents, Reserve:Sewer, Interchange:Hole in the Fence) [true/false]
Updates Reserve Cliff extract to be useable without a paracord, red rebel, and with an armored rig. [true/false]
Sets a maximum hold time for extracts. [number:seconds:1-60]
